title: MD
biography: International Cancer Research Award. Associated with Tehran University of Medical Sciences.
aiSummary: Reza Malekzadeh is a gastroenterology specialist with an H-index of 132 at Tehran University of Medical Sciences (Member). Has been published in The Lancet, JAMA Oncology, Nature Genetics. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
